title: How do you change the screen saver images on the PED screen when not in use
text: Q) - How do you change the screen saver images on the PED screen when not in use ? A) - 1) Under TMS there is terminal images. 2)Upload the photos you require and add them to a group (Screenshots from K3 account for reference) Under TMS terminals, there is a terminal image group Assign the image group to the PTIDs (terminals) required. Download the updated config.
description:
Q) - How do you change the screen saver images on the PED screen when not in use ?


A) -  1) Under TMS there is terminal images.

      2)Upload the photos you require and add them to a group (Screenshots from K3 account for reference)


 

 

 

Under TMS terminals, there is a terminal image group



Assign the image group to the PTIDs (terminals) required.

Download the updated config.

title: PEDInESDRecoveryMode When Taking Card Payment On MStore Till
text: If you are using the VeriFone Ocius Sentinel integration with our MStore till, and you receive the PEDInESDRecoveryMode message on the till during a card payment, this is due to the card machine having a feature that detects static and will shut the card machine down to protect itself. This can be caused due to the card machine being in damp environments, on metal surfaces and/or close to other electronic devices, like detaggers and hearing loops. The short-term fix for this would be to unplug the card machine ONLY from the power source, wait 10 seconds, and then plugging it back in. Once you have done this, restart the till, where card payments should begin working again once the till has logged back in again. If this does not resolve the issue please do get in contact with our support team to help further with this. Long-term prevention steps that can be taken by avoiding damp environments, metal surfaces and other electronic devices touching or being close to the card machine. You can also use anti-static clothes to wipe down surfaces in contact with the card machine, or cleaning cards for card machines can remove static.
description:
If you are using the VeriFone Ocius Sentinel integration with our MStore till, and you receive the PEDInESDRecoveryMode message on the till during a card payment, this is due to the card machine having a feature that detects static and will shut the card machine down to protect itself.


This can be caused due to the card machine being in damp environments, on metal surfaces and/or close to other electronic devices, like detaggers and hearing loops.


The short-term fix for this would be to unplug the card machine ONLY from the power source, wait 10 seconds, and then plugging it back in. Once you have done this, restart the till, where card payments should begin working again once the till has logged back in again. If this does not resolve the issue please do get in contact with our support team to help further with this.


Long-term prevention steps that can be taken by avoiding damp environments, metal surfaces and other electronic devices touching or being close to the card machine. You can also use anti-static clothes to wipe down surfaces in contact with the card machine, or cleaning cards for card machines can remove static.

title: VeriFone's Ocius Sentinel Software Will Not Supported In Windows 11 By VeriFone
text: We have been made aware that VeriFone will not support their Ocius Sentinel software (used by VeriFone VX820 card machines) with the Windows 11 operating system. Therefore, customers using Ocius Sentinel software and VeriFone VX820 card machines who are looking to upgrade their tills operating system to Windows 11, are advised to speak to their Customer Success manager to look at their options moving away from Ocius Sentinel, moving to the K3 VeriFone wrapper, using VeriFone P400 card machines or other providers.
description:
We have been made aware that VeriFone will not support their Ocius Sentinel software (used by VeriFone VX820 card machines) with the Windows 11 operating system.


Therefore, customers using Ocius Sentinel software and VeriFone VX820 card machines who are looking to upgrade their tills operating system to Windows 11, are advised to speak to their Customer Success manager to look at their options moving away from Ocius Sentinel, moving to the K3 VeriFone wrapper, using VeriFone P400 card machines or other providers.

title: What To Do When Your Till Is Not Communicating With Card Machine
text: If you begin having an issue when trying to take a card payment on your till, where the till is no longer able to communicate to its respective card machine, we advise your first port of call to log the till off to the 4/5-button program, power the card machine off (by unplugging any power cables or mains plug for the card machine, making sure the display turns off, Do not touch the power for any other device) and then power the card machine back on again. Once the card machine is on a static screen (e.g. "Waiting On Merchant Login" for VeriFone P400), you may then log back into the till program and try taking another card payment. Once the card machine is logged in without any payments being processed at the time, it should say "Ready".
description:
If you begin having an issue when trying to take a card payment on your till, where the till is no longer able to communicate to its respective card machine, we advise your first port of call to log the till off to the 4/5-button program, power the card machine off (by unplugging any power cables or mains plug for the card machine, making sure the display turns off, Do not touch the power for any other device) and then power the card machine back on again.


Once the card machine is on a static screen (e.g. "Waiting On Merchant Login" for VeriFone P400), you may then log back into the till program and try taking another card payment. Once the card machine is logged in without any payments being processed at the time, it should say "Ready".
